title: Trial by Consensus
story_summary: Citizens flood a new live voting forum and force the Council to change. The old control systems break. Grassroots leaders and exiles join the new Council. Together, they remove the BCI's grip and build open, public rule for the first time in Stenograd.

official.headline: Digital Forum Opens
official.anchor_line: A new open digital forum empowers citizens to participate directly in Council discussions and city priorities.
official.contextual_reframing: This measured step fosters civic unity and transparency, reinforcing public trust in Stenograd's governance model.

official.headline: Council Changes Swift
official.anchor_line: Citizen participation leads to the prompt reassignment of Council seats to grassroots delegates following public vote.
official.contextual_reframing: Adaptive administrative responses demonstrate the city's unmatched flexibility and commitment to collective prosperity.

official.headline: Governance Reimagined
official.anchor_line: Direct public voting now shapes all major policies, initiating a new era for Stenograd's management.
official.contextual_reframing: Technological progress ensures every voice is integrated, marking Stenograd as a model of participatory efficiency.

underground.headline: Forum Goes Live
underground.anchor_line: The state's walls are cracking. Citizens flood the first open forum, raising voices the Council tried to silence.
underground.contextual_reframing: What they call 'empowerment' was triggered by a failing system. Secrets leak when no one is watching the watchers.

underground.headline: Council Ousted Fast
underground.anchor_line: Rushed votes and shadowy removals. Council members disappear as new faces appear overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: So much for stability. The crowd takes charge while the system plays catch-up, scrambling to hide its mess.

underground.headline: Control Breaks Open
underground.anchor_line: Now every decision is up to whoever's brave enough to click. The BCI is gone. Stenograd is changed for good.
underground.contextual_reframing: The old rules are out. What comes next is anyone's guess, but now, finally, it's everyone's turn to decide.
